1169530.name: Trauma Simulator - Emergency Room
1169530.description:
Currently Trauma Simulator is available upon a request by sending email to sandis.kondrats@exonicus.com

Emergency Room is so called "sandbox" mode of the Trauma Simulator. The user is given 5 minutes to stabilize the patient. The system is tracking overall score, critical action completion rates, time to completion, and allow individual and aggregate performance compiling.

Tying interventions and visual output to the physiology engine results in realistic alterations in levels of consciousness and vital signs. It also allows injuries to present and respond to treatment in real time without instructor input.

The user can practice and receive feedback on advanced trauma life support (ATLS) and tactical combat casualty care (TCCC) repeatedly and to master trauma management and life saving decision making skills.
1169530.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
